name: mori (pdfirefly, brokegang, Eazy, yoitserica)
description:
Please play the game on fullscreen*

  • A & D keys - to move
  • SPACE key - to jump
  • MOUSE - to aim
  • LEFT CLICK - to shoot

In Mori, your goal is to wake up from your sleep in time for school! Have you ever woken up from falling or getting hurt in your dream? Well that's the basic premise! 

Game by:

  • Ron Liew (programming, design, music/audio and vfx)
  • Ryan Matthews (programming and design)
  • Erica Mitton (art, UI and design)
